item.title: Sweep Control v1.2.1.11
item.description:
Product: Sweep Control v1.2.1.11
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 28 May 2025 11:22:43 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: [SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.2.1]
#107 Update dependencies
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.9.2.14
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.9.2.14
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 28 May 2025 10:45:58 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.9.2]
#106 Option: hold B sweep if T > T_hold
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.2.3.15
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.2.3.15
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Sat, 24 May 2025 13:28:36 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.2.3]
#102 Enable opening 64 bit Lockin and KH7008
#103 Retrieve user and instrument information from the database
#104 FIx issue that would not update the lockin gains after updating the Krohn Hite gains
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.9.2.23
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.9.2.23
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 22 May 2025 15:26:58 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: [1.9.2]
- #33 and #34: Fixes issues with API methods
- Update to latest Instrument Framework and Cryostat Interface
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.3.12
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.3.12
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 22 May 2025 09:54:26 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.20.3]
- #100 Fix display version number

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.2.11
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.2.11
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 21 May 2025 19:03:41 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.20.2]
Issues:
#97 Fix IDN query
#98: Disable logging if device array is not initialized or data arrays are empty
#99: API methods that use parent API overrides should also use parent typedefs

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
